#summary How to build qtplay

= Introduction =

The only tricky step to building qtplay is first building argtable.


= Details =

To build argtable, first download it from http://argtable.sourceforge.net/
Next, configure your build environment to create a Universal Binary of argtable, following the instructions here:
http://developer.apple.com/technotes/tn2005/tn2137.html
